components.content:
- Be nice to other people. We want our server to be welcoming to as many people as possible.
- Any form of discrimination (including but not limited to sexism, homophobia, ableism, or the use of derogatory slurs) or any form of bullying or harassment will **not** be tolerated.
- Generally, if you think something may hurt someone's feelings or make someone uncomfortable, **do not say it**.
- Do not ping people if they do not want to be pinged. Be mindful of reply pings as well.
